items.title: Command line
items.summary:
The bin provides 3 commands:

$ pages start entry.bs.js PORT # Starts a devServer
$ pages build entry.bs.js # Build in distDirectory
$ pages deploy entry.bs.js git-branch # deploy to GH Pages
